name: Lighthouse Keeper (Byonox)
description:
Collect the Crystal and Return it to your Main Tower.

Player Movement: WASD (or Right JoyStick)

Camera Movement: Mouse (or Left JoyStick)

Jump: Spacebar (or South Controller Button)

Sprint: Left Shift  (or Left Lower Trigger)

This game has been developed in 48h  in participation of Summer Jam 22.

Credits:

Tim Keil
